title: Various Artists - Caferino Albuquerque Vol. 2 [trip-hop]
description:
This is the second volume from my Caferino Albuquerque series. What are we talking about here? These are self-made compilations made with the goal of making you discover some of the hidden treasures of the trip-hop movement, buried so deep that you are easily tempted to throw the patience out the window and stick with Massive Attack and Portishead. Massive Attack and Portishead aren&#039;t the only worthwhile proposals in the genre, and what these compilations want is to uncover those talents that aren&#039;t too well-known because some are too impatient to look into recommendations list or because some might be frustrated by the numerous more or less trip-hop projects that don&#039;t seem interesting at first.
I hope you enjoy my mix! :) And don&#039;t forget to check out other stuff from these bands, they&#039;re worth digging and supporting!
